A4.text: Days later, Bayern won the Champions League for the fourth time after a 25-year gap, defeating Valencia on penalties.

A5.text: Bayern Munich went on to win all titles in the 2012–13 season, beating Borussia Dortmund 2–1 in the Champions League final.

A6.text: Ajax went on to win the competition three years in a row (1971 to 1973), which Bayern Munich emulated from 1974 to 1976.

A7.text: Only one club has won all of their matches in a single tournament en route to the tournament victory: Bayern Munich in the 2019–20 season.
